website_summaries.verdict: Sporting designs like Winnie the Pooh, Minnie Mouse, and many more options available online, this simple-to-operate monogram machine is the best option for Disney fans.
pros: USB port for downloading additional designs
cons: Does not include a foot controller

customer_reviews.title: It's a great machine, but it doesn't come with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is great. It's easy to use and the designs are really nice. I did purchase the thread and the stabilizer recommended below, but nowhere does it tell you that you are going to have to purchase bobbin thread that costs an extra sixty dollars. Nor does it tell you that you have to buy super expensive software so that you can use your own designs. As you can probably tell I am new to machine embroidery, and as I said, I really do like the machine. I just wasn't prepared to have to get so many extras.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelina Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - but get 6x6
customer_reviews.text: Truly - you don't need to spend thousands of dollars to try this great new hobby. One thing I would say is if you can squeeze out the extra dollars - get one with a 6x6 hoop..... It would have been well worth it. Am I getting another one ??? Can't afford it but ... am I glad I invested in this one even though dozens of people told me I would regret buying one n this price range - Absolutely !!! So - buy it - have fun - but if you can afford it go one step UP and get the larger hoop and throat area on the machine. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Church Secretary

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to complete more than one stitch with this machine. It continually gives the message that the "safety device has been activated". I find this machine very difficult to use considering it has not worked AT ALL. I ordered Embroidex thread initially and thought maybe the thread was the issue. I ordered Brother thread in hopes that since several reviews indicated that the machine is very picky about the thread you use. Now it is too late I assume for a return because that option is not available on the Amazon site. It has been 35 days since I received the machine. Not able to use it at all. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifelong crafter and have been using various sewing machines since I was 5. I have never been so frustrated with a sewing or embroidery machine. It is constantly displaying an error message, stops running after just a few seconds, and is about as user friendly as I imagine it would be trying to learn to pilot a fighter jet while blindfolded. Don’t waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!

It's been a delight since the day I unpacked it. Stitched everything perfectly (way different than my other machine which was a fussy little bugger from day one). I actually was having "sew" much fun with this machine that I bought a sewing/embroidery combo and am resuming an old hobby.

product_meta.title: Brother PE550D Embroidery Machine, 125 Built-in Designs including 45 Disney Designs, 4" x 4" Hoop Area, Large 3.2" LCD Touchscreen, USB Port, 9 Font Styles
product_meta.description:
Style:PE550D

The Brother PE550D brings the magic of Disney to your embroidery machine. This easy to use and affordable embroidery machine features a 4” x 4” embroidery field along with an included grid sheet and builtin alignment tools that help you align your design and needle position for precise placement on your fabric. The PE550D Brother embroidery machine is packed with 125 builtin decorative designs, including 45 Disney designs. It also features 9 fonts (6 English and 3 Japanese) for monogramming and personalization.

The PE550D embroidery machine features a 3.2” Sew Smart easytoview LCD color touchscreen that permits you to preview designs and see them in alternate colors before stitching. The PE550D is a flexible embroidery machine. You can easily adjust the builtin embroidery designs by aligning text at an angle or in curves, placing text on multiple lines, increasing and decreasing the spacing between letters, and more. This Brother embroidery machine has a builtin memory and a USB port for uploading your own designs.

Loading thread is made easy with a builtin automatic needle threader. This system takes care of threading the needle for you with just the touch of a lever. An additional embroidery editing feature permits you to move, resize, mirror image, and rotate prior to beginning the embroidering project. This embroidery machine includes an instructional DVD, a bilingual user manual, a 25year limited warranty, and free customer phone and online technical support for the life of the product.
feature_bullets: 125 Built-in designs: Featuring 125 Built-in designs including 45 Disney designs, the PE550D allows you to bring magic to any project
9 Built-in fonts: Personalize your projects with 6 English and 3 Japanese lettering font styles
USB Port: Import your embroidery designs into your PE550D's built-in memory through the USB port
Large color touchscreen: Preview your designs before embroidering with the large, 3.2" inch LCD color touchscreen display
4" X 4" Embroidery field: This embroidery-only machine comes with a 4" x 4" inch hoop, an embroidery foot and built-in alignment tools
The PE550D is an embroidery machine and does not function as a traditional sewing machine
